name: Monkfish
tagline: We bring your ideas to life
description:
Monkfish UK is a leading Digital Marketing Company, providing professional support to businesses and organizations in London, the South East and the East Midlands.

They specialize in professional web design and re-designs, domain name registration and web hosting, but also offer a vast range of internet marketing tools. These include search engine optimization, social media management and email marketing.
Monkfish UK are dedicated to building a close working relationship with their customers.
